Your first xnlogic application - part 1

Jan 1, 2014 • tutorial

In HOME/lib/my_twitter/post.rb:

module MyTwitter

  xn_part

  property :post, type: :text
  property :time, type: :date

  from_one :User, to: post, from: posted_by

end

A note about the code: This is pretty cool. The actual markdown for it is the > symbol
